title: No Boys?
description: Can she lie without being caught?Janet has been raised by two uncles who still treat her like a baby. So when Eric starts asking her out, she doesn't know what to do. She can't bring him to her house, since her uncles won't let her date "strange" boys. Finally she begins seeing him secretlyâ€”which leads to more trouble than she ever imagined...
author: McClure Jones
